DataElement.preferredName: Diagnosis Autoimmune Disease Prior Transplantation Description Comments Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe an autoimmune disease issue at the time of bone marrow transplantation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diagnosis Autoimmune Disease Prior Transplantation Description
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._A condition in which the body recognizes its own tissues as foreign and directs an immune response against them._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Earlier in time or order._Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Diagnosis Autoimmune Disease Disease or Disorder
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:A condition in which the body recognizes its own tissues as foreign and directs an immune response against them.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

A disorder resulting from loss of function or tissue destruction of an organ or multiple organs, arising from humoral or cellular immune responses of the individual to his own tissue constituents. It may be systemic (e.g., systemic lupus erythematosus), or organ specific, (e.g., thyroiditis).

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

Concepts.definition: Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.
